mapper.select: SELECT A.calendar_id AS calendarId, A.title, A.color, A.created_at AS createdAt, A.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM calendar A JOIN calendar_user B ON A.calendar_id = B.calendar_id WHERE B.user_id = #{signedUserId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM calendar_user WHERE user_id = #{signedUserId} AND calendar_id = #{calendarId}
